name: skil3e-css
author: Skil3e
description: A simple utility SCSS Lib using SASS modules. Supports @use and @forward

scripts.dev: sass src/skil3e.scss:src/debug/skil3e.css --no-source-map && npx postcss src/debug/skil3e.css --use autoprefixer -d src/debug/ --no-map
scripts.build-basic: sass src/basic.scss:dist/skil3e-basic.min.css --no-source-map --style compressed && npx postcss dist/skil3e-basic.min.css --use autoprefixer -d dist/ --no-map
scripts.build: sass src/skil3e.scss:dist/skil3e.min.css --no-source-map --style compressed && npx postcss dist/skil3e.min.css --use autoprefixer -d dist/ --no-map
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run build-basic && npm publish
